Uses of Interface
com.lukeleber.scandroid.io.CommunicationInterface

  • Packages that use CommunicationInterface 
    Package Description
    com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter
    The Scandroid API cannot communicate directly with vehicles, so it becomes necessary to utilize a middle-man component ("Interpreter") that translates the digital output from Scandroid to the analog input required by onboard micro-controllers and vice-versa.
    com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter.binary  
    com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter.elm327
    Implementation details for the ELM327 can be found within this package.
    com.lukeleber.scandroid.io.bluetooth
    All components used to implement the CommunicationInterface via bluetooth are found within this package.
